topic.title: Emergency Care Time Seen for Treatment
topic.shortdesc: An Emergency Care Time Seen For Treatment is the time that the PATIENT is seen by a clinical decision maker (a CARE PROFESSIONAL who can define the management plan and discharge the PATIENT) to diagnose the problem and arrange or start definite treatment as necessary.
